ComicInfo.Title: Walk While Ye Have the Light....
ComicInfo.Series: The Darkness vs. Eva: Daughter of Dracula
ComicInfo.Summary:
Top Cow and Dynamite are at it again, this time pitting The Darkness against the ass-kicking daughter of Dracula (and slayer of all things evil and undead) - Eva, as the two meet for the first time ever!
Now, as our third issue opens, Jackie and Eva face off in a battle for the very power of The Darkness as the rest of the underworld seeks to protect itself from the nasty things unleashed by Count Orlok! Written by Leah Moore and John Reppion, and drawn by Edgar Salazar, this first issue also features three incredible

ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Brett Booth, Edgar Salazar, Paul Renaud
